description: The family will cheer when you dish up these tasty baked chicken bites. Seasoned with Cajun spices and drizzled with chilli-infused honey,
name: Chicken Bites With Chilli-Infused Honey Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g chicken thigh fillets, cut into 3cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place chicken and egg in a bowl and toss to coat. Combine crumbs, flour and seasoning in a large bowl. Add chicken mixture and toss to coat. Transfer chicken to tray. Bake for 17 minutes or until golden and cooked through.
Meanwhile, heat mash according to packet instructions. Spoon into a medium bowl.

Place butter, honey and chilli in a small saucepan and heat over medium heat for 1 minute, whisking, or until warmed through and combined. Drizzle chicken with chilli mixture, then serve with salad and mash drizzled with oil and seasoned with pepper.
